title: Punt.com
author: Punt.com
content: Punt.com is giving away $50 in BTC to one lucky winner; the rules are as follows:(1) Record a guide on how to play on Punt.com for new users;(2) Upload it to YouTube;(3) Include Punt.com in title;(4) Must be in English;(5) Reply with the youtube link to your Punt.com guide in this thread;After we get enough entries, I will personally watch all the videos and the video that is of the best quality will win $50 in BTC, straight to their Punt.com wallet! Best of luck!

comments.author: Hodoor
comments.body: Does this promo have a deadline, or at least a certain number of participants until the winner selection starts ? If not, then it can go forever.

comments.author: Punt.com
comments.body: Quote from: Hodoor on September 18, 2022, 11:46:51 AMDoes this promo have a deadline, or at least a certain number of participants until the winner selection starts ? If not, then it can go forever.If we can get at least 4 unique entries, that should be sufficient for the winner selection process to start
